name: Lyressa The Hopeful (Scrapped Ver.)
description:
This version of Lyressa The Hopeful will be scrapted and left here as free to play. The actual project is in development and is being remade from scratch. Controls Main Arrow Keys
Movement

Find and eat Whistling Taro to unlock.

  • Increased movement speed.
  • You can jump 5 extra times in mid-air.
  • Decreased invincibility time.
Z (in mid-air)Mid-air Jump Water Magic (Soon)

Find and eat Salty Candy to unlock.

  • Increased maximum health.
  • You can run on water and extinguish fire.
  • Decreased attack range.
Updates What to expect by completion.
  • 7 worlds total.
  • 6 magic abilities total.
  • 2 major game modes (plus a future "encore" mode).
  • 36 different enemies total (including mini-bosses, world bosses, secret bosses, and the final boss).
  • 2 Endings.
  • 120 Souls. (This may change later.)
  • 7 Hero Souls.
  • Co-op Mode. (Player 2 can join and leave mid-game at any time.)
  • A lot of gems.
  • Lots of secrets.
  • Lots of exploration.
  • More stuff to be listed later.
